question: The more you code, the more of me there is. I may be gone for now but you can‚Äôt get rid of me forever. What am I?
I‚Äôm a language for everything yet I have no real identity of my own. Good luck trying to compile me. What am I?

I‚Äôm fundamental and used to build larger structures. While you‚Äôll find many different kinds of me, we all just mess with information in different ways. What am I?

I‚Äôm sent before I‚Äôm ready, I‚Äôll break before you know it and you can‚Äôt find me many places. What am I?
I‚Äôm a simple thing, nothing special. While I have many cousins we‚Äôre all very similar because we set your project up. What am I?
I‚Äôm pretty focused so I don‚Äôt do too much. However whatever you wish is my command. What am I?
I catch you and your teammates when you fall and I can be you in a pinch. What am I?
I‚Äôm your ‚Äúwaiter‚Äù for information. What I am?

I‚Äôm a shape shifter. You could call me someone who could possess multiple qualities but only has one set of them at any given time. What am I?
I‚Äôm a red and black structure and often forgotten about after learned. Although you almost always use a different color of me for Christmas. What am I?
